props.docblock: Specifies an element near which the modal should be displayed

props.name: placement
props.docblock: Specifies position according to the element that the ``positionRef`` prop points to

props.name: hasArrow
props.docblock: Caret to the modal popup pointing to the target

props.docblock: Specifies the content of the button

props.docblock: Specifies class name to append to the base element
